metadata.description: Extended mapping between CLI command options and OpenAPI schema fields
metadata.notes: Expanded to include compute-envs commands across multiple platforms

LaunchCmd.description: Launch workflow command - maps to WorkflowLaunchRequest schema

params-file.notes: CLI accepts file path, API expects file content as string

compute-env.notes: CLI accepts name/reference, must be resolved to ID before API call

labels.notes: CLI accepts label objects, must be resolved to IDs. Can create labels if they don't exist.

config.notes: CLI accepts file path, API expects file content as string

pre-run.notes: CLI accepts script file path, API expects script content as string

post-run.notes: CLI accepts script file path, API expects script content as string

AddCmd.description: Add pipeline command - maps to CreatePipelineRequest schema

labels.notes: CLI accepts label objects, must be resolved to IDs. Can create labels if they don't exist.

pipeline.notes: Positional parameter, goes into launch configuration

AddCmd__secrets.description: Add secret command - maps to CreatePipelineSecretRequest schema

UpdateCmd__secrets.description: Update secret command - maps to UpdatePipelineSecretRequest schema

AddCmd__workspaces.description: Add workspace command - maps to CreateWorkspaceRequest schema

UpdateCmd__workspaces.description: Update workspace command - maps to UpdateWorkspaceRequest schema

AddCmd__datasets.description: Add dataset command - maps to CreateDatasetRequest schema

UpdateCmd__datasets.description: Update dataset command - maps to UpdateDatasetRequest schema

UpdateCmd__actions.description: Update action command - maps to UpdateActionRequest schema

AddAwsManualCmd.description: Add AWS Batch Manual compute environment - maps to CreateComputeEnvRequest with AwsBatchConfig

credentials.notes: CLI accepts credentials name/reference, resolved to ID

labels.notes: CLI accepts label objects, resolved to IDs. Labels created if don't exist.

fusion-v2.notes: CLI flag name differs from API field name

fast-storage.notes: CLI uses simplified name, API uses technical name

pre-run.notes: CLI accepts script file path, API expects script content

post-run.notes: CLI accepts script file path, API expects script content

nextflow-config.notes: CLI accepts config file path, API expects config content

batch-execution-role.notes: CLI uses longer name, API uses simplified name

AddK8sCmd.description: Add Kubernetes compute environment - maps to CreateComputeEnvRequest with K8sComputeConfig

ssl-cert.notes: CLI accepts certificate file path, API expects certificate content

head-account.notes: CLI uses abbreviated name, API uses full name

storage-claim.notes: CLI uses abbreviated name, API adds 'Name' suffix

storage-mount.notes: CLI uses abbreviated name, API adds 'Path' suffix

compute-account.notes: CLI uses abbreviated name, API uses full name

head-pod-spec.notes: CLI accepts YAML file path, API expects YAML content

service-pod-spec.notes: CLI accepts YAML file path, API expects YAML content

AddSlurmCmd.description: Add Slurm HPC compute environment - maps to CreateComputeEnvRequest with SlurmComputeConfig

transformation_types.direct: CLI field maps directly to API field with same name and compatible type
transformation_types.file_to_text: CLI accepts file path (Path), API expects file content (string). File must be read and content passed.
transformation_types.name_to_id: CLI accepts human-readable name/reference, API expects entity ID. Must resolve via API lookup.
transformation_types.objects_to_ids: CLI accepts object list, API expects ID list. Must resolve each object to its ID.

id_suffix.description: Add 'Id' suffix when CLI field references a single entity

ids_suffix.description: Add 'Ids' suffix when CLI field references multiple entities

text_suffix.description: Add 'Text' suffix when CLI accepts file path but API needs content

script_suffix.description: CLI field already includes 'Script' suffix, matches API field

run_prefix.description: Add 'run' prefix for workflow run naming
